website_summaries.verdict: A contemporary bookcase that provides six shelves and fits snuggly in any corner.
pros: Looks great on its own, or several bookcases can be used in conjunction with one another in a single living space
Cappuccino finish adds a hint of style and sophistication to a living space's decor
cons: Hollow sides leave much to be desired

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising and shoddy product
customer_reviews.text: i purchased this item from Amazon specifically because the item description says ASSEMBLY REQUIRED: NO. when the 70 lb box arrived, it was in pieces, requiring full assembly. I can usually put together things, i can follow the directions. However after several hours of trying, the book case can't fit together flush. I am convinced that the pre-drilled holes are slightly off alignment. I really am disappointed. Its too much of a hassle to return it. I can't use it because it's not assembled right. it's a WASTE OF MONEY. I am SO DISAPPOINTED in this product. I basically threw away $127.50.
customer_reviews.author: Linda R.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice in my living room! Good quality and easy to assemble.. I used gorilla glue instead of the glue that was supplied. It’s very dark, almost black.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece. Great quality. The only thing is the color. They sell it only in Cappuccino but what i got looks almost black.....Espresso maybe....i am not sure if this is what they call Cappuccino or I got the wrong color. Now talking this pic I see it does lighter in the pic. All I am saying is it will look darker in person. I am still very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Albertz

customer_reviews.title: Like the product but packaging was not good
customer_reviews.text: When we opened the box we found that several pieces were damaged due to rough handling during shipping. The box was left at our door and we did not have the opportunity to examine the box which showed signs of being bashed in one one side. The dent in the box transferred to one of the shelf pieces and then to one of the side pieces. By the time we realized it we decided to assemble the product and see if the damage would show significantly. Fortunately it did not show that much so we decided to keep rather than return it. The product assembled in about two hours and appears to be sturdy and good looking.
customer_reviews.author: Peter H Hames

customer_reviews.title: Well designed, well shipped! Excellent product for amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived well protected. The design is very smart. The assembly is not difficult. The bookcase is not too heavy but very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: hufada

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy, and relatively easy to put together, BUT don't trust the dimensions!
customer_reviews.text: Measurement: 35.00" width x 11.75" depth x 70.75" height This was in the product description, and it is not accurate. The height may be, but the width is >19.5", and the depth is >15.5". Apparently someone didn't know how to convert metric to Imperial, and I should have done my own calculations instead of trusting the listing. I set up an aquarium far enough away to accomodate a 35" width shelf, and now I have weird symmetry in the room. It's a bummer, but I still like it and am glad that I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: annasin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: A good quality and inexpensive corner bookcase is hard to come by. I have no complaints about this one. My dad put it together in an hr and hes got every body issue any 50 yr old man has, but had no problems. It's beautiful and since I plan on having a 2 ft plant on top, I love the height being not too tall as to touch the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: jassi

customer_reviews.title: Solid as a Rock - Setup was Stupid Proof
customer_reviews.text: Came with instructions, looked at them once and got it setup. Its insanely strait forward if you have ever put together furniture before. With one person took like 20 minutes maybe? Almost took longer to get the box where i needed it and to unpack it. Its way sturdier than I thought it was going to be. Awesome addition to my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Nick W.

customer_reviews.title: Low cost. Highly function.
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy and decent looking corner bookshelf. I have two. Easy to assemble. Hold a lot of books. Coloring is dark. Almost black. Thick pressed particle board with laminate. The second one came with a dime sized puncture in the box and one of the panels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy bookcase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bookcase to go in the corner of my mom’s small apartment in the nursing home. It is a perfect size. My husband said it went together easy and it is very sturdy. I put both books and pictures on the shelve and mom loves it. Also the dark brown color went perfect with other furniture I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This bookcase was exactly what I looking for. Very inexpensive - but mixes well with my much more expensive furniture pieces without cheapening the look. Very easy to assemble. Nice dark brown. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Click Away

customer_reviews.title: Assembly Required, But No Instructions!
customer_reviews.text: The listing claimed no assembly required, but the bookcase is in pieces in the box. Plus, there's no instructions on how i'm supposed to assemble it. Ugh! So frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Reader Rick

customer_reviews.title: Larger and more study than expected
customer_reviews.text: What a great surprise to get this shelf and feel how heavy and sturdy it is. Go it put together without any problems and set it up. Nearly all of what is on the shelf are keepsakes from my military tour. My recently passed mom always said to me, "Honey, keep those things. Someday you'll have a special place in your home to display them." Well, this shelf helped me fulfill that advice and now every time I walk through my living room, I see those keepsakes and have great memories of traveling around the world. Thanks mom, And a great shelf!!
customer_reviews.author: Lance Navy Veteran

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Bookcase
customer_reviews.text: This bookcase is much higher quality than I expected. I was worried it would look reflective like the picture but it doesn't. The color is dark brown and it matches my other furniture perfectly. Assembly was very easy and the bookcase is really sturdy. It took quite some time to get the pieces out of the box because it was packed so well. Nothing was scratched or scuffed during shipping which I was really happy about. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: It came in broken but since it was on the outside and it would have been more trouble to return it i assembled it anyway. Not bad but still pressboard.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Murawski

customer_reviews.title: Return very inconvenient. Item severely damaged
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with a big hole punched in the side. There is no way the delivery person who stepped on it didn’t hear the crack made by their foot. Have to be present for pick up of return so it’s impossible to retun this very large and heavy bookcase unless I take it to UPS myself.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley N Prickitt Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf but came damages
customer_reviews.text: The bookshelf is the perfect size for my corner and I am able to put a lot of books and other things on it. However it came damaged once two of the edges and unfortunately one of the marks is visible, I’m not able to hide it. All in all it’s a good shelf, seems pretty sturdy and was super easy to put together. Because the box is so large, it would cost more to try and return or exchange it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: The bookcase is very attractive in a small cornered area ...
customer_reviews.text: The bookcase is very attractive in a small cornered area close to a desk. In my case, I hold research books.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shelving unit!
customer_reviews.text: Functional and cute! Not too difficult to assemble. I was able to do so myself, without husbands assistance. Love how it fits into the corner of my room.
customer_reviews.author: weli

customer_reviews.title: The color is beautiful and fits perfectly with my existing decor
customer_reviews.text: The color is beautiful and fits perfectly with my existing decor. It was easy to put together but you will need to either angle the books, buy book ends, or have something stopping the books from falling off the end of the shelf. I love the corner design - so unique!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Good Furniture
customer_reviews.text: Furniture fits description, however when shipment arrived, a couple of corners were slightly chipped. The finish is very thin, revealing the wood. Otherwise, it is what I asked for.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Goodwyn

customer_reviews.title: So much better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Fairly easy to assemble, if you follow the pictures. Very sturdy, if assembled correctly. It’s perfect corner bookshelf!
customer_reviews.author: B. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Linda and others don't know how to do simple asdembley
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, literally just pushes together, super clean looking
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to build and actually holds up pretty well
customer_reviews.text: Originally this came damaged. The seller responded promptly and sent me new pieces. It was easy to build and actually holds up pretty well. I got my MultiFunctional Printer off my desk and onto this bookcase. I can barely see sag if any on the shelf it sits on. The books sit on it well too. It's a good color and matches my other fake wood office furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great packaging, great overall.
customer_reviews.text: One of the quality piece of furniture I ordered online. Everything fits perfectly, build quality is great. Packaging was excellent, all corners of the package was reinforced, rarely do I ever receive anything this well packaged. They even include wood glue as part of the installation tools/hardware. I don't think I've ever seen any manufacture that included wood glue with their items. Great looking piece and feels very solid. Cheaper and better quality than another piece of furniture that I bought on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: MHN

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy to assemble shelf unit. It fits great in the corner. Sturdy shelves
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They are good, but a little more expensive than I would like given the hollowness of the sides. It looks good and the adjustable feet are a great idea and allow leveling on uneven floors.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Bastien

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Looks and works great! I needed something to get my printer paper & textbooks off the floor. I did have some help assembling it as I’m somewhat challenged when it comes to putting together furniture.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kyes

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking garbage
customer_reviews.text: With how heavy this is, I thought it would be real wood but it's the cheap particle board. Box was damaged during shipping and the side of the main piece caved in and shows the main sides are actually hollow.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Great! Exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: It's well designed and sturdy, and a good size if you need something to fill an awkward corner nook.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J. Warnock

customer_reviews.title: Streamlined my office supplies!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the better investments I've made on Amazon regarding furniture. It was packed very well, and surprisingly, I did not have any chipping at all on any of the pieces. I love that I was able to take my mess (spread out on horizontal desks) and was able to stack them in a neat and orderly manner into a corner unit. It's right next to my desk so that I can grab things easily. I am a neat-freak and appreciate order--this bookcase helped me to accomplish my goal of streamlining my mess into an attractive unit.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Was in perfect condition. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Arrived ahead of schedule :). All pieces accounted for. Was in perfect condition. Easy to assemble. It's a great piece for a corner. Attractive and sturdy. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: ALN

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Addition
customer_reviews.text: Was a beautiful addition to my home office. Very sturdy. Lots of shelf space. Very deep shelves
customer_reviews.author: Kadie Asbury

customer_reviews.title: Durability and functionality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together quality was great everything fit really nice
customer_reviews.author: gregg turner

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this book case. It is an amazing addition to my living room. My husband had no issues putting it together. I plan to order another one soon to go in the other corner of my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality shelf
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice, really solid shelf. it came very well packed and assembly was quick and easy. We purchased it for my father-in-law's apartment but I'd like to get a couple more for my living room.
customer_reviews.author: kbean

customer_reviews.title: Assembled easily. is robust and holds an implausible amount of ...
customer_reviews.text: Assembled easily. is robust and holds an implausible amount of books. Replaced my flimsy aging ladder bookcase, took all the books and stored them in less space....
customer_reviews.author: SJB

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: It’s good for what it is and met my expectations
customer_reviews.author: R. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Coaster Home Furnishings 800270 book case, a great quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Prior to purchasing this product, I had purchased a wine bar, a 48" round table and a entertainment center all with quality wood but my hired worker that assembled them, stated that my new bookcase (photo display case) was actually the best quality wood, along with the best packaging. It is also so easy for me to not have to order from so many companies on line, when I can find many of them at Amazon, with one-click shopping. No I am not a Amazon on line plant just a satisfied customer...
customer_reviews.author: RALSPACE

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Holds all of my pictures and memorabilia and looks well
customer_reviews.author: gray

customer_reviews.title: Awesome corner piece!!!
customer_reviews.text: I took my time writing a post because It is NOT wood but laminate. Having said this, the company that I purchased it from sent me a damaged end, BUT they were quickly willing to change it if I didn't like it. I have this piece is in the basement and it looks great. I would recommend this piece to anyone who wants a elegant look for books and pictures, or like I use it to store all my media center.
customer_reviews.author: Stevens G.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Kind of expensive, but these are hard to find and it looks great! Had to screw it to the wall I’m one place because it wasn’t very stable on plush carpet. It’s sturdy now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived w 3 pieces damaged
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to assemble the bookcase, sadly 3 pieces were damaged probably due to handling no point of even trying.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Page 1 and 6 of directions only😱 can't give much ...
customer_reviews.text: Page 1 and 6 of directions only😱 can't give much of a review, have to figure out what I do in the middle before page 6
customer_reviews.author: Amie smith

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as is. It is sturdy and the color is beautiful! We have loads of books, and our cats sometimes jump on the shelves, so it can take a decent amount of weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The shelf is nice looking and of acceptable quality but it arrived with ...
customer_reviews.text: The shelf is of acceptable quality but it arrived with scratches on the back of both corners. Not cool. I could of course return it but who wants to repack and ship something so large? It works fine for the corner I'm using it in but I really resent paying good money for damaged goods.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Nina Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Slight damage likely from shipping
customer_reviews.text: Well built. Easy to assemble. Did have one shelf that was damaged on arrival. I did note that the company would likely send a replacement shelf but I felt no need for this because it was the bottom side of the shelf and didn't affect the integrity, so I simply installed it as the bottom shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent addition to our living room. Took some time to be delivered. Easy assembly. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Vedanth

customer_reviews.title: This bookcase is sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This bookcase looks great and is sturdy. We have to use bookends on most of the shelves, however, as expected. We have our cookbooks and the books we want to read soon on the shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Good, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love this self. Super easy to put together and fun to decorate.
customer_reviews.author: Alireza

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It was everything I needed and more as a Knick knack shelve
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Duffy

customer_reviews.title: really nice
customer_reviews.text: The wood is solid; the color is a deep chocolate brown; It didn't fit together quite as tight as I would want but that could have been my lack of skills as an assembler. Great bookcase for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: This bookcase arrived very fast. It was fairly easy to put together and took about 45 minutes total with my husband doing all the work and me reading the instructions. It is going to need a wall tether though. Probably because it is on carpet and we have small children. Overall very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality is what I expected for the price, but the color is basically black.
customer_reviews.author: klp

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and does it's job
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little shelf. Very sturdy. But you need to have patience to assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: cheaply made, but as long as you're careful with transporting it you're fine
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to get holes to line up during construction but overall a decent product
customer_reviews.author: sam patrick

customer_reviews.title: Inspect after unpacking
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks and quality of the bookcase, it is solid but when we unpacked it we had two corners severely damaged it’s a shame that you have to spend this kind of money and have it damaged during delivery.
customer_reviews.author: daniel a. daria

customer_reviews.title: Love this bookshelf
customer_reviews.text: Love this bookshelf! It doesn't take up a lot of room but holds a ton of books! It looks amazing in our daughter's nursery & I love how I can put larger sized books on top. It's very sturdy & was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Shanda Harper

customer_reviews.title: Quite sturdy and heavier than other bookshelves
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, and meets the description. Quite sturdy and heavier than other bookshelves. sits snuggly in the corner and can hold a decent amount of books.
customer_reviews.author: Kavij

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in my home
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my home. Surfaces were uneven and had some difficulty adding layers at the bottom to even everything out. But it's solid and holds a lot of weight on each shelf. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: kmak

customer_reviews.title: Bookcase
customer_reviews.text: I received my order and it was beautiful I really like it fits nicely in my grandchildren media room I rate it a 10
customer_reviews.author: Christina Mcpherson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small areas
customer_reviews.text: bookcase fits perfectly in the small corner area we needed it for, it is sturdy and nice looking and wasn't difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: durmalbs

customer_reviews.title: Meet my expectations
customer_reviews.text: It has a lovely look, the instructions were very simple - I was amazed how easy this was to assembly. I did it all by myself!
customer_reviews.author: John Gaspard

customer_reviews.title: Nice book case
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assembly and good quality. It is a little to dark (basically black). Overall it was a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Digby Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This bookcase is exactly what I wanted! It is heavy and speaks of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Anne W. Kay

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Came in great condition, very secure, wasn't scared it would get damaged. Very sturdy, beautiful color. It is kind of heavy, so I would definitely recommend 2 people to move/assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: Lu Rz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is a great product. it is a nice bookcase and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: asilvy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shelf
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, had a really small gouge in the corner where cannot see it, no problem, would recommend this shelf! NIce size on shelves!
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. It isn't stained its covered and pressed wood ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, Sturdy . It isn't stained its covered and pressed wood but it seems to be pretty good quality ,time will tell but I was happy once it was put together. I took about an hour to put together by myself
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I really, really like this bookshelf! Great quality and the shelves are high enough to accommodate several pretty large textbooks. I'm not very handy with tools so I hired a handyman who assembled it with ease.
customer_reviews.author: KabiMenz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the space I needed it for
customer_reviews.text: It was a little more difficult to assemble than I would have liked, but I did manage. A couple of the shelves have space between them and the walls so I have to put the books up at the front to cover it up, but it's not real noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: P. Kiessling

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed for a tricky corner in our condo. Went together in about 30 minutes with my 3 year old helping me hammer in the dowels! It says "real wood" which of course I knew for the price meant particle board... just don't think you're getting a solid wood item.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great Bookcase!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and looks great! I definitely recommend it for any college student. Very clean look and finish.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Freund

customer_reviews.title: Great Bookcase but...
customer_reviews.text: this is a great, good looking, space saving, seemingly well constructed (despite not being real wood) book shelf. it is not easy to put together though. the instructions are bad, but i eventually got it put together.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, easy to put together and great price! I would recommend to anyone looking for a nice corner unit
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: the only hard part was getting it out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged, no damages, easy installation, comes with all parts & diagram instruction, looks great & fits perfect!
customer_reviews.author: hchou

customer_reviews.title: Trendy, but hard to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice piece of furniture, but putting it together was a real pain in the neck.! the instructions and graphics were very confusing, at the end I had like 8 leftover pieces, I have put together items from Ikea & was much easier,. But once it was done we place it on the corner and it look good and trendy, you just need lots of patience and time to assembling it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Ceron

customer_reviews.title: Very easy assembly and a sturdy piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional packaging job...all corners well protected. Very easy assembly and a sturdy piece of furniture. The actual sides are pressboard and we ended up damaging one accidentally during our assembly process (absolutely our fault). Other than that, definitely a great deal for such a large piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: keri shuman

customer_reviews.title: Bookshelf aka organizer-shelf
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, directions were great. Bookcase worked well for my purpose. I bought decorative canvas containers for each shelf to get my husbands "stuff" also known as mail off the counters. And he is okay with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Judith Whitcomb

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I like the bookshelf. However, shipping was abhorrent. The packaging was heavily damaged and several of the pieces themselves were damaged, although not heavily. Luckily, the most severe damage is either on the underside of shelves or on the wall-facing finish. I don't have time to deal with getting a replacement, so I didn't bother following up with the company.
customer_reviews.author: akira2185

customer_reviews.title: easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This product was super easy to put together. I usually don't have patience for putting furniture together, but this one had super easy instructions and was built in 20 minutes. Only issue there was a small crack in the base (possibly from shipping) but contacted the company who quickly provided me a 10% refund.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Saul

product_meta.title: Coaster Home Furnishings Corner Bookcase, Cappuccino
product_meta.description: Display your book collection with style and pride. This bookcase features six convenient shelves to show off your personal library. Ideal for smaller spaces, it tucks neatly into a corner to free up precious square footage. A handsome cappuccino finish gives it a classically chic appearance. Crafted from durable MDF, particle board, and engineered veneer, this bookcase is strong, sturdy, and stunning.
feature_bullets: Materials: MDF, particle board, and engineered veneer
Measurement: 35.00" width x 11.75" depth x 70.75" height

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars162 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
